Name: Spaghetti Bolognese
Description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich tomato and meat sauce.

Name: Caesar Salad
Description: Fresh romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

Name: Chocolate Cake
Description: A decadent dessert with layers of rich chocolate and cream.

Name: French Onion Soup
Description: A rich and flavorful soup topped with a slice of toasted bread and melted cheese.

Name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
Description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken served over fettuccine pasta.

Name: Lemon Tart
Description: A tangy lemon custard in a crisp pastry shell, topped with whipped cream.

Name: Bruschetta
Description: Grilled bread topped with a fresh mixture of tomatoes, basil, and mozzarella.

Name: Beef Lasagna
Description: Layers of pasta, ground beef, tomato sauce, and melted cheese.
